conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a first contact movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I'd highly recommend "The War of the Worlds" for a classic first contact movie experience. Based on H.G. Wells' novel, this film portrays an alien invasion in Victorian England with an all-star cast including Tom Cruise and Dakota Fanning.

If you're looking for something more modern and animated, "Tangled" might be the one! This Disney film tells the story of Rapunzel's first venture into the world outside her tower, featuring voices by stars like Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi. Enjoy the adventure!

It's a thrilling science fiction film that explores the consequences of an extraterrestrial race's arrival on Earth. Another film that might appeal to you is "Smokin' Aces", a fast-paced action movie starring an impressive ensemble cast, including Ben Affleck and Ray Liotta.

Wes Studi delivers a captivating performance as the bounty hunter.
